message.content:
cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LO, cs.DS, cs.FL. 

The paper deals with static analysis of heap-based languages, which is a topic commonly studied in programming languages (cs.PL) and software engineering (cs.SE). The focus on termination analysis and cyclicity suggests that the paper may also belong to the logic in computer science (cs.LO) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. Finally, the use of propositional formulae and abstract domains suggests that the paper may also be relevant to formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL).
